Class AuthService

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.auth.AuthService
@Service public class AuthService extends Object
Service class responsible for handling authentication-related operations using AWS Cognito.

Provides functionalities such as user sign-in, sign-up, account verification, password reset, and password change by interacting with AWS Cognito Identity Provider.

  • Constructor Details

    • AuthService

      public AuthService(@Value("${aws.cognito.region}") String region, UserService userService)
      Constructs an instance of AuthService with the specified AWS region and user service.

      Initializes the CognitoIdentityProviderClient with the provided region and default credentials.

      Parameters:
      region - the AWS region for Cognito services
      userService - the user service for managing user-related operations

  • Method Details

    • signIn

      public software.amazon.awssdk.services.cognitoidentityprovider.model.AdminInitiateAuthResponse signIn(String email, String password)
      Authenticates a user with the provided email and password.

      Validates the input credentials, checks if the user is blocked, and initiates the authentication process with AWS Cognito.

      Parameters:
      email - the user's email address
      password - the user's password
      Returns:
      an AdminInitiateAuthResponse containing authentication tokens
      Throws:
      MissingEmailOrPasswordException - if the email or password is missing or blank
      BlockedUserCantSignInException - if the user is blocked from signing in

    • signUp

      public void signUp(SignUpDto dto)
      Registers a new user using the provided sign-up data.

      Constructs a SignUpRequest with the user's details and sends it to AWS Cognito for registration.

      Parameters:
      dto - the sign-up data transfer object containing user registration details

    • verifyAccount

      public void verifyAccount(String email, String confirmationCode)
      Verifies a user's account using their email and confirmation code.

      Sends a ConfirmSignUpRequest to AWS Cognito to confirm the user's account and subsequently saves the user in the application's database.

      Parameters:
      email - the user's email address
      confirmationCode - the confirmation code sent to the user's email

    • ForgotPassword

      public void ForgotPassword(String email)
      Initiates the password reset process for a user.

      Sends a ForgotPasswordRequest to AWS Cognito to initiate the password reset process.

      Parameters:
      email - the user's email address requesting a password reset

    • resetPassword

      public void resetPassword(String email, String confirmationCode, String newPassword)
      Completes the password reset process by confirming the reset with a verification code.

      Sends a ConfirmForgotPasswordRequest to AWS Cognito to set a new password for the user.

      Parameters:
      email - the user's email address
      confirmationCode - the confirmation code sent to the user's email
      newPassword - the new password to be set for the user

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(String accessToken, String previousPassword, String proposedPassword)
      Changes the password for an authenticated user.

      Sends a ChangePasswordRequest to AWS Cognito to update the user's password.

      Parameters:
      accessToken - the access token of the authenticated user
      previousPassword - the user's current password
      proposedPassword - the new password to be set
